title: The Decay of Lying - Vivian repeats the argument

content.prompt: The second of Vivian's two speeches repeats the argument of the first that

choices.label: nature is the primary source of human unhappiness
art has much to learn from nature
the failures of nature inspire people to create

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
